name: Santa Fish Games
description:
Help the Santa Fish survive in the deep water!
Play this new game with high quality stunning designs where you have to slowly or quickly move to avoid the objects in your way. Reach To be Better Players!

How to play Santa Fish Games:

Tap to the right to swirl right
Tap to the left to swirl left
Tap the left and right quickly to move up straight

Features

- Stunning art
- Great Music
- Fun game play
- Games For Kids and All Age
- Christmas Games

Enjoy!!!
